absorb.description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage taken
by the target.
absorb.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
absorb.effect_short: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
absorb.name: Absorb

acid.description:
The opposing Pokémon are attacked
with a spray of harsh acid. This may
also lower their Sp. Def stats.
acid.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
acid.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
acid.name: Acid

acid-armor.description:
The user alters its cellular structure to
liquefy itself, sharply raising its
Defense stat.
acid-armor.effect_long: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.
acid-armor.effect_short: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.
acid-armor.name: Acid Armor

acid-spray.description:
The user spits fluid that works to melt
the target. This harshly lowers
the target’s Sp. Def stat.
acid-spray.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
acid-spray.effect_short: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
acid-spray.name: Acid Spray

acrobatics.description:
The user nimbly strikes the target.
If the user is not holding an item,
this attack inflicts massive damage.
acrobatics.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user has no held item, this move has double power.
acrobatics.effect_short: Has double power if the user has no held item.
acrobatics.name: Acrobatics

acupressure.description:
The user applies pressure to stress
points, sharply boosting one of its or
its allies’ stats.
acupressure.effect_long:
Raises one of the target's stats by two stages.  The raised stat is chosen at random from any stats that can be raised by two stages.  If no stat is eligible, this move will fail.

If the target has a substitute, this move will have no effect, even if the user is the target.

This move cannot be copied by mirror-move.
acupressure.effect_short: Raises one of a friendly Pokémon's stats at random by two stages.
acupressure.name: Acupressure

aerial-ace.description:
The user confounds the target with speed,
then slashes.
This attack never misses.
aerial-ace.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
aerial-ace.name: Aerial Ace

aeroblast.description:
A vortex of air is shot at the target to
inflict damage.
Critical hits land more easily.
aeroblast.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
aeroblast.effect_short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
aeroblast.name: Aeroblast

after-you.description:
The user helps the target and makes it
use its move right after the user.
after-you.effect_long:
The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority.
If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
after-you.effect_short: Makes the target act next this turn.
after-you.name: After You

agility.description:
The user relaxes and lightens its body to
move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.
agility.effect_long: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.
agility.effect_short: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.
agility.name: Agility

air-cutter.description:
The user launches razor-like wind
to slash the opposing Pokémon.
Critical hits land more easily.
air-cutter.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
air-cutter.effect_short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
air-cutter.name: Air Cutter

air-slash.description:
The user attacks with a blade of air that
slices even the sky. This may also make the
target flinch.
air-slash.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
air-slash.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
air-slash.name: Air Slash

ally-switch.description:
The user teleports using a strange
power and switches places with one of
its allies.
ally-switch.effect_long: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.  If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.
ally-switch.effect_short: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.
ally-switch.name: Ally Switch

amnesia.description:
The user temporarily empties its mind to
forget its concerns.
This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.
amnesia.effect_long: Raises the user's Special Defense by two stages.
amnesia.effect_short: Raises the user's Special Defense by two stages.
amnesia.name: Amnesia

ancient-power.description:
The user attacks with a prehistoric power.
This may also raise all the user’s stats
at once.
ancient-power.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats one stage.
ancient-power.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage.
ancient-power.name: Ancient Power

aqua-jet.description:
The user lunges at the target at a speed
that makes it almost invisible.
This move always goes first.
aqua-jet.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
aqua-jet.name: Aqua Jet

aqua-ring.description:
The user envelops itself in a veil made
of water. It regains some HP every turn.
aqua-ring.effect_long:
Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP at the end of each turn.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

This effect is passed on by baton-pass.
aqua-ring.effect_short: Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP each turn.
aqua-ring.name: Aqua Ring

aqua-tail.description:
The user attacks by swinging its tail as if
it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.
aqua-tail.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
aqua-tail.name: Aqua Tail

arm-thrust.description:
The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed
arm thrusts that hit two to five times in
a row.
arm-thrust.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
arm-thrust.name: Arm Thrust

aromatherapy.description:
The user releases a soothing scent that
heals all status conditions affecting
the user’s party.
aromatherapy.effect_long: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user's party.
aromatherapy.effect_short: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
aromatherapy.name: Aromatherapy

aromatic-mist.description:
The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally
Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.
aromatic-mist.effect_long: Raises a selected ally's Special Defense by one stage.
aromatic-mist.effect_short: Raises a selected ally's Special Defense by one stage.
aromatic-mist.name: Aromatic Mist

assist.description:
The user hurriedly and randomly
uses a move among those known
by other Pokémon in the party.
assist.effect_long:
Uses a move from another Pokémon in the user's party, both selected at random.  Moves from fainted Pokémon can be used.  If there are no eligible Pokémon or moves, this move will fail.

This move will not select assist, chatter, circle-throw, copycat, counter, covet, destiny-bond, detect, dig, dive, dragon-tail, endure, feint, fly focus-punch, follow-me, helping-hand, me-first, metronome, mimic, mirror-coat, mirror-move, phantom-force protect, quick-guard, roar shadow-force, sketch, sleep-talk, snatch, struggle, switcheroo, thief, trick, whirlwind, or wide-guard.

This move cannot be copied by mirror-move, nor selected by metronome or sleep-talk.
assist.effect_short: Randomly selects and uses one of the trainer's other Pokémon's moves.
assist.name: Assist

assurance.description:
If the target has already taken some
damage in the same turn, this attack’s
power is doubled.
assurance.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.
assurance.effect_short: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.
assurance.name: Assurance

astonish.description:
The user attacks the target while shouting
in a startling fashion.
This may also make the target flinch.
astonish.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
astonish.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
astonish.name: Astonish

attack-order.description:
The user calls out its underlings to
pummel the target.
Critical hits land more easily.
attack-order.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
attack-order.effect_short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
attack-order.name: Attack Order

attract.description:
If it is the opposite gender of the user,
the target becomes infatuated and less
likely to attack.
attract.effect_long: Causes the target to fall in love with the user, giving it a 50% chance to do nothing each turn.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.  If either Pokémon leaves the field, this effect ends.
attract.effect_short: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.
attract.name: Attract

aura-sphere.description:
The user lets loose a blast of aura power
from deep within its body at the target.
This attack never misses.
aura-sphere.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
aura-sphere.name: Aura Sphere

aurora-beam.description:
The target is hit with a rainbow-colored
beam. This may also lower the target’s
Attack stat.
aurora-beam.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.
aurora-beam.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.
aurora-beam.name: Aurora Beam

autotomize.description:
The user sheds part of its body
to make itself lighter and sharply
raise its Speed stat.
autotomize.effect_long: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.  Halves the user's weight; this effect does not stack.
autotomize.effect_short: Raises the user's Speed by two stages and halves the user's weight.
autotomize.name: Autotomize

avalanche.description:
An attack move that inflicts double the
damage if the user has been hurt by the
target in the same turn.
avalanche.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target damaged the user this turn and was the last to do so, this move has double power.

pain-split does not count as damaging the user.
avalanche.effect_short: Inflicts double damage if the user takes damage before attacking this turn.
avalanche.name: Avalanche

baby-doll-eyes.description:
The user stares at the target with its baby-doll
eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move
always goes first.
baby-doll-eyes.effect_long: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
baby-doll-eyes.effect_short: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
baby-doll-eyes.name: Baby-Doll Eyes

barrage.description:
Round objects are hurled at the target
to strike two to five times in a row.
barrage.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
barrage.name: Barrage

barrier.description:
The user throws up a sturdy wall that
sharply raises its Defense stat.
barrier.effect_long: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.
barrier.effect_short: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.
barrier.name: Barrier

baton-pass.description:
The user switches places with a party
Pokémon in waiting and passes along
any stat changes.
baton-pass.effect_long:
User switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  Stat changes, confusion, and persistent move effects are passed along to the replacement Pokémon.

The following move effects are passed:

* aqua-ring
* both the user's and target's effect of block, mean-look, and spider-web
* the curse effect of curse
* embargo
* focus-energy or an activated lansat-berry
* gastro-acid
* ingrain
* being sapped by leech-seed
* being targeted by lock-on or mind-reader
* magnet-rise
* perish-song's counter
* power-trick
* substitute; the doll's HP is unchanged

The replacement Pokémon does not trigger effects that respond to Pokémon switching in.
baton-pass.effect_short: Allows the trainer to switch out the user and pass effects along to its replacement.
baton-pass.name: Baton Pass

beat-up.description:
The user gets all party Pokémon to attack
the target. The more party Pokémon,
the greater the number of attacks.
beat-up.effect_long:
Inflicts typeless regular damage.  Every Pokémon in the user's party, excepting those that have fainted or have a major status effect, attacks the target.  Calculated stats are ignored; the base stats for the target and assorted attackers are used instead.  The random factor in the damage formula is not used.  dark Pokémon still get STAB.

This effect breaks through wonder-guard.
beat-up.effect_short: Hits once for every conscious Pokémon the trainer has.
beat-up.name: Beat Up

belch.description:
The user lets out a damaging belch
at the target. The user must eat a held
Berry to use this move.
belch.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  Can only be used if the user has eaten a berry since the beginning of the battle.

After the user eats a berry, it may use this move any number of times until the end of the battle, even if it switches out.  Eating a held berry, eating a berry via bug-bite or pluck, or being the target of a Flung berry will enable this move.  Feeding a Pokémon a berry from the bag or using natural-gift will not.

If the trainer chooses this move when it cannot be used, the choice is rejected outright and the trainer must choose another move.
belch.effect_short: Can only be used after the user has eaten a berry.
belch.name: Belch

belly-drum.description:
The user maximizes its Attack stat in
exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.
belly-drum.effect_long: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.
belly-drum.effect_short: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.
belly-drum.name: Belly Drum

bestow.description:
The user passes its held item to the
target when the target isn’t holding
an item.
bestow.effect_long: Transfers the user's held item to the target.  If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.
bestow.effect_short: Gives the user's held item to the target.
bestow.name: Bestow

bide.description:
The user endures attacks for two
turns, then strikes back to cause
double the damage taken.
bide.effect_long:
User waits for two turns.  On the second turn, the user inflicts twice the damage it accumulated on the last Pokémon to hit it.  Damage inflicted is typeless.

This move cannot be selected by sleep-talk.
bide.effect_short: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.
bide.name: Bide

bind.description:
Things such as long bodies or tentacles
are used to bind and squeeze
the target for four to five turns.
bind.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid-spin cancels this effect.
bind.effect_short: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
bind.name: Bind

bite.description:
The target is bitten
with viciously sharp fangs.
This may also make the target flinch.
bite.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
bite.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
bite.name: Bite

blast-burn.description:
The target is razed by a fiery explosion.
The user can’t move on the next turn.
blast-burn.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
blast-burn.effect_short: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
blast-burn.name: Blast Burn

blaze-kick.description:
The user launches a kick that lands a
critical hit more easily.
This may also leave the target with a burn.
blaze-kick.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
blaze-kick.effect_short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
blaze-kick.name: Blaze Kick

blizzard.description:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave
the opposing Pokémon frozen.
blizzard.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target.

During hail, this move has 100% accuracy.  It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
blizzard.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target.
blizzard.name: Blizzard

block.description:
The user blocks the target’s way with arms
spread wide to prevent escape.
block.effect_long:
The target cannot switch out normally.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the field.

The target may still escape by using baton-pass, u-turn, or a shed-shell.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton-pass.
block.effect_short: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
block.name: Block

blue-flare.description:
The user attacks by engulfing the target
in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame.
This may also leave the target with a burn.
blue-flare.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
blue-flare.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
blue-flare.name: Blue Flare

body-slam.description:
The user drops onto the target
with its full body weight. This may also
leave the target with paralysis.
body-slam.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
body-slam.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
body-slam.name: Body Slam

bolt-strike.description:
The user surrounds itself with a great amount
of electricity and charges its target.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.
bolt-strike.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
bolt-strike.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
bolt-strike.name: Bolt Strike

bone-club.description:
The user clubs the target with a bone.
This may also make the target flinch.
bone-club.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
bone-club.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
bone-club.name: Bone Club

bone-rush.description:
The user strikes the target with a hard
bone two to five times in a row.
bone-rush.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
bone-rush.name: Bone Rush

bonemerang.description:
The user throws the bone it holds. The
bone loops to hit the target twice,
coming and going.
bonemerang.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
bonemerang.name: Bonemerang

boomburst.description:
The user attacks everything around it
with the destructive power of a terrible,
explosive sound.
boomburst.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
boomburst.name: Boomburst

bounce.description:
The user bounces up high, then drops on
the target on the second turn. This may
also leave the target with paralysis.
bounce.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  User bounces high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.

During the immune turn, gust, hurricane, sky-uppercut, smack-down, thunder, and twister still hit the user normally.  gust and twister also have double power against the user.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock-on, mind-reader, or no-guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep-talk.
bounce.effect_short: User bounces high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.
bounce.name: Bounce

brave-bird.description:
The user tucks in its wings and charges
from a low altitude.
This also damages the user quite a lot.
brave-bird.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
brave-bird.effect_short: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
brave-bird.name: Brave Bird

brick-break.description:
The user attacks with a swift chop. It
can also break barriers, such as Light
Screen and Reflect.
brick-break.effect_long: Destroys any light-screen or reflect on the target's side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.  The barriers are destroyed even if this move has no effect.
brick-break.name: Brick Break

brine.description:
If the target’s HP is half or less,
this attack will hit with double
the power.
brine.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.
brine.effect_short: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.
brine.name: Brine

bubble.description:
A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at
the opposing Pokémon.
This may also lower their Speed stats.
bubble.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
bubble.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
bubble.name: Bubble

bubble-beam.description:
A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected
at the target. This may also lower
its Speed stat.
bubble-beam.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
bubble-beam.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
bubble-beam.name: Bubble Beam

bug-bite.description:
The user bites the target. If the target
is holding a Berry, the user eats it and
gains its effect.
bug-bite.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca-berry or rowap-berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.
bug-bite.effect_short: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.
bug-bite.name: Bug Bite

bug-buzz.description:
The user vibrates its wings to generate a
damaging sound wave. This may also lower
the target’s Sp. Def stat.
bug-buzz.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
bug-buzz.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
bug-buzz.name: Bug Buzz

bulk-up.description:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk up
its body, raising both its Attack and
Defense stats.
bulk-up.effect_long: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by one stage each.
bulk-up.effect_short: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by one stage.
bulk-up.name: Bulk Up

bulldoze.description:
The user strikes everything around it
by stomping down on the ground.
This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.
bulldoze.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
bulldoze.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
bulldoze.name: Bulldoze

bullet-punch.description:
The user strikes the target
with tough punches as fast as bullets.
This move always goes first.
bullet-punch.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
bullet-punch.name: Bullet Punch

bullet-seed.description:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at the
target two to five times in a row.
bullet-seed.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
bullet-seed.name: Bullet Seed

calm-mind.description:
The user quietly focuses its mind and
calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and
Sp. Def stats.
calm-mind.effect_long: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage each.
calm-mind.effect_short: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage.
calm-mind.name: Calm Mind

camouflage.description:
The user’s type is changed depending on
its environment, such as at water’s edge,
in grass, or in a cave.
camouflage.effect_long:
User's type changes according to the terrain.

Terrain        | New type
-------------- | --------------
Building       | normal
Cave           | rock
Desert         | ground
Grass          | grass
Mountain       | rock
Ocean          | water
Pond           | water
Road           | ground
Snow           | ice
Tall grass     | grass

In Pokémon Battle Revolution:

Terrain        | New type
-------------- | --------------
Courtyard      | normal
Crystal        | rock
Gateway        | water
Magma          | rock
Main Street    | normal
Neon           | normal
Stargazer      | rock
Sunny Park     | grass
Sunset         | ground
Waterfall      | grass
camouflage.effect_short: User's type changes to match the terrain.
camouflage.name: Camouflage

captivate.description:
If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite
gender of the user, it is charmed, which
harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
captivate.effect_long: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
captivate.effect_short: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages if it's the opposite gender.
captivate.name: Captivate

celebrate.description:
The Pokémon congratulates
you on your special day!
celebrate.effect_long: This move has a unique effect, but it is unreleased, so the specific effect is unknown.
celebrate.name: Celebrate

charge.description:
The user boosts the power of the Electric
move it uses on the next turn. This also
raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.
charge.effect_long: Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.
charge.effect_short: Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  User's Electric moves have doubled power next turn.
charge.name: Charge

charge-beam.description:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any remaining
electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
charge-beam.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
charge-beam.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
charge-beam.name: Charge Beam

charm.description:
The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
This harshly lowers its Attack stat.
charm.effect_long: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
charm.effect_short: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
charm.name: Charm

chatter.description:
The user attacks using a sound wave
based on words it has learned.
This confuses the target.
chatter.editor_note: In TPP's PBR, the confuse rate is 1%.
chatter.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion.  If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion.

This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror-move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep-talk.
chatter.effect_short: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.
chatter.name: Chatter

chip-away.description:
Looking for an opening, the user strikes
consistently. The target’s stat changes
don’t affect this attack’s damage.
chip-away.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.
chip-away.name: Chip Away

circle-throw.description:
The target is thrown, and a different
Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild,
this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
circle-throw.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage, then switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon, selected at random.

If the target is under the effect of ingrain or suction-cups, or it has a substitute, or its Trainer has no more usable Pokémon, it will not be switched out.  If the target is a wild Pokémon, the battle ends instead.
circle-throw.effect_short: Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
circle-throw.name: Circle Throw

clamp.description:
The target is clamped and squeezed by
the user’s very thick and sturdy shell for
four to five turns.
clamp.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid-spin cancels this effect.
clamp.effect_short: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
clamp.name: Clamp

clear-smog.description:
The user attacks by throwing a clump of
special mud. All stat changes are
returned to normal.
clear-smog.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  All of the target's stat modifiers are reset to zero.
clear-smog.effect_short: Removes all of the target's stat modifiers.
clear-smog.name: Clear Smog

close-combat.description:
The user fights the target up close
without guarding itself. This also lowers
the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.
close-combat.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
close-combat.effect_short: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
close-combat.name: Close Combat

coil.description:
The user coils up and concentrates.
This raises its Attack and Defense stats
as well as its accuracy.
coil.effect_long: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.
coil.effect_short: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.
coil.name: Coil

comet-punch.description:
The target is hit with a flurry of punches
that strike two to five times in a row.
comet-punch.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
comet-punch.name: Comet Punch

confide.description:
The user tells the target a secret, and the target
loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers
the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
confide.effect_long: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.
confide.effect_short: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.
confide.name: Confide

confuse-ray.description:
The target is exposed to a sinister
ray that triggers confusion.
confuse-ray.name: Confuse Ray

confusion.description:
The target is hit by a weak telekinetic
force. This may also confuse the target.
confusion.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.
confusion.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.
confusion.name: Confusion

constrict.description:
The target is attacked with long, creeping
tentacles or vines.
This may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
constrict.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
constrict.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
constrict.name: Constrict

conversion.description:
The user changes its type to become the
same type as the move at the top of the
list of moves it knows.
conversion.effect_long: User's type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random.  hidden-power and weather-ball are treated as normal.  Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible.  If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
conversion.effect_short: User's type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
conversion.name: Conversion

conversion-2.description:
The user changes its type to make itself
resistant to the type of the attack the
opponent used last.
conversion-2.effect_long: Changes the user's type to a type either resistant or immune to the last damaging move that hit it.  The new type is selected at random and cannot be a type the user already is.  If there is no eligible new type, this move will fail.
conversion-2.effect_short: Changes the user's type to a random type either resistant or immune to the last move used against it.
conversion-2.name: Conversion 2

copycat.description:
The user mimics the move used immediately
before it. The move fails if no other move
has been used yet.
copycat.effect_long:
Uses the last move that was used successfully by any Pokémon, including the user.

This move cannot copy itself, nor roar nor whirlwind.

This move cannot be copied by mirror-move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep-talk.
copycat.effect_short: Uses the target's last used move.
copycat.name: Copycat

cosmic-power.description:
The user absorbs a mystical power from
space to raise its Defense and
Sp. Def stats.
cosmic-power.effect_long: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
cosmic-power.effect_short: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
cosmic-power.name: Cosmic Power

cotton-guard.description:
The user protects itself by wrapping
its body in soft cotton, which drastically
raises the user’s Defense stat.
cotton-guard.effect_long: Raises the user's Defense by three stages.
cotton-guard.effect_short: Raises the user's Defense by three stages.
cotton-guard.name: Cotton Guard

cotton-spore.description:
The user releases cotton-like spores
that cling to the opposing Pokémon,
which harshly lowers their Speed stats.
cotton-spore.effect_long: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.
cotton-spore.effect_short: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.
cotton-spore.name: Cotton Spore

counter.description:
A retaliation move that counters any
physical attack, inflicting double the
damage taken.
counter.effect_long:
Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a physical move this turn.  Inflicts twice the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will fail.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

This move cannot be copied by mirror-move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
counter.effect_short: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.
counter.name: Counter

covet.description:
The user endearingly approaches
the target, then steals the target’s
held item.
covet.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding an item and the user is not, the user will permanently take the item.  Damage is still inflicted if an item cannot be taken.

Pokémon with sticky-hold or multitype are immune to the item theft effect.

The target cannot recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
covet.name: Covet

crabhammer.description:
The target is hammered with a large pincer.
Critical hits land more easily.
crabhammer.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
crabhammer.effect_short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
crabhammer.name: Crabhammer

crafty-shield.description:
The user protects itself and its allies from
status moves with a mysterious power.
This does not stop moves that do damage.
crafty-shield.effect_long:
Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn.

Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.
crafty-shield.effect_short: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves.
crafty-shield.name: Crafty Shield

cross-chop.description:
The user delivers a double chop with its
forearms crossed.
Critical hits land more easily.
cross-chop.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
cross-chop.effect_short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
cross-chop.name: Cross Chop

cross-poison.description:
A slashing attack with a poisonous blade
that may also poison the target.
Critical hits land more easily.
cross-poison.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
cross-poison.effect_short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
cross-poison.name: Cross Poison

crunch.description:
The user crunches up the target
with sharp fangs. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.
crunch.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
crunch.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
crunch.name: Crunch

crush-claw.description:
The user slashes the target with hard
and sharp claws. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.
crush-claw.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
crush-claw.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
crush-claw.name: Crush Claw

crush-grip.description:
The target is crushed with great force.
The more HP the target has left,
the greater this move’s power.
crush-grip.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.
crush-grip.effect_short: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
crush-grip.name: Crush Grip

curse.description:
A move that works differently for the
Ghost type than for all other types.
curse.effect_long:
If the user is a ghost: user pays half its max HP to place a curse on the target, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP every turn.
Otherwise: Lowers the user's Speed by one stage, and raises its Attack and Defense by one stage each.

The curse effect is passed on by baton-pass.

This move cannot be copied by mirror-move.
curse.effect_short: Ghosts pay half their max HP to hurt the target every turn.  Others decrease Speed but raise Attack and Defense.
curse.name: Curse

cut.description:
The target is cut with a scythe or claw.
This can also be used to cut down thin trees.
cut.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
cut.name: Cut

dark-pulse.description:
The user releases a horrible aura imbued
with dark thoughts.
This may also make the target flinch.
dark-pulse.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
dark-pulse.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
dark-pulse.name: Dark Pulse

dark-void.description:
Opposing Pokémon are dragged into
a world of total darkness that makes
them sleep.
dark-void.name: Dark Void

dazzling-gleam.description:
The user damages opposing Pokémon
by emitting a powerful flash.
dazzling-gleam.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
dazzling-gleam.name: Dazzling Gleam

defend-order.description:
The user calls out its underlings to
shield its body, raising its Defense
and Sp. Def stats.
defend-order.effect_long: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
defend-order.effect_short: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
defend-order.name: Defend Order

defense-curl.description:
The user curls up to conceal weak spots
and raise its Defense stat.
defense-curl.effect_long:
Raises user's Defense by one stage.

After this move is used, the power of ice-ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.
defense-curl.effect_short: Raises user's Defense by one stage.
defense-curl.name: Defense Curl

defog.description:
A strong wind blows away the target’s
barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen.
This also lowers the target’s evasiveness.
defog.effect_long:
Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.  Clears away fog.  Removes the effects of mist, light-screen, reflect, safeguard, spikes, stealth-rock, and toxic-spikes from the target's side of the field.

If the target is protected by mist, it will prevent the evasion change, then be removed by this move.
defog.effect_short: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.  Removes field effects from the enemy field.
defog.name: Defog

destiny-bond.description:
When this move is used, if the user faints,
the Pokémon that landed the knockout
hit also faints.
destiny-bond.effect_long:
If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint.  End-of-turn damage is ignored.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
destiny-bond.effect_short: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.
destiny-bond.name: Destiny Bond

detect.description:
Enables the user to evade all attacks.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used
in succession.
detect.effect_long:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick-guard, or wide-guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock-on, mind-reader, and no-guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn-drill, and sheer-cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain-dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse's curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom-desire and future-sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move's protection after it hits
* imprison
* perish-song
* shadow-force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych-up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
detect.effect_short: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.
detect.name: Detect

diamond-storm.description:
The user whips up a storm of diamonds
to damage opposing Pokémon. This may
also raise the user’s Defense stat.
diamond-storm.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense one stage.
diamond-storm.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense by one stage.
diamond-storm.name: Diamond Storm

dig.description:
The user burrows, then attacks
on the next turn.
It can also be used to exit dungeons.
dig.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  User digs underground for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, earthquake, fissure, and magnitude still hit the user normally, and their power is doubled if appropriate.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock-on, mind-reader, or no-guard.

This move cannot be selected by sleep-talk.
dig.effect_short: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.
dig.name: Dig

disable.description:
For four turns, this move prevents the
target from using the move it last used.
disable.effect_long: Disables the target's last used move, preventing its use for 4–7 turns, selected at random, or until the target leaves the field.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed,  if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, or if it already has a move disabled, this move will fail.
disable.effect_short: Disables the target's last used move for 1-8 turns.
disable.name: Disable

disarming-voice.description:
Letting out a charming cry, the user does
emotional damage to opposing Pokémon.
This attack never misses.
disarming-voice.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
disarming-voice.name: Disarming Voice

discharge.description:
The user strikes everything around it
by letting loose a flare of electricity.
This may also cause paralysis.
discharge.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
discharge.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
discharge.name: Discharge

dive.description:
Diving on the first turn, the user floats
up and attacks on the next turn.
dive.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  User dives underwater for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, surf, and whirlpool still hit the user normally, and their power is doubled if appropriate.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock-on, mind-reader, or no-guard.

This move cannot be selected by sleep-talk.
dive.effect_short: User dives underwater, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.
dive.name: Dive

dizzy-punch.description:
The target is hit with rhythmically
launched punches. This may also
leave the target confused.
dizzy-punch.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.
dizzy-punch.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.
dizzy-punch.name: Dizzy Punch

doom-desire.description:
Two turns after this move is used, the
user blasts the target with a
concentrated bundle of light.
doom-desire.effect_long:
Inflicts typeless regular damage at the end of the third turn, starting with this one.  This move cannot score a critical hit.  If the target switches out, its replacement will be hit instead.  Damage is calculated at the time this move is used; stat changes and switching out during the delay won't change the damage inflicted.  No move with this effect can be used against the same target again until after the end of the third turn.

This effect breaks through wonder-guard.

If the target is protected by protect or detect on the turn this move is used, this move will fail.  However, the damage on the third turn will break through protection.

The damage is applied at the end of the turn, so it ignores endure and focus-sash.

This move cannot be copied by mirror-move.
doom-desire.effect_short: Hits the target two turns later.
doom-desire.name: Doom Desire

double-edge.description:
A reckless, life-risking tackle.
This also damages the user
quite a lot.
double-edge.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
double-edge.effect_short: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
double-edge.name: Double-Edge

double-hit.description:
The user slams the target with a long tail,
vines, or a tentacle.
The target is hit twice in a row.
double-hit.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
double-hit.name: Double Hit

double-kick.description:
The target is quickly kicked twice in
succession using both feet.
double-kick.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
double-kick.name: Double Kick

double-slap.description:
The target is slapped repeatedly, back
and forth, two to five times in a row.
double-slap.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
double-slap.name: Double Slap

double-team.description:
By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory
copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
double-team.effect_long: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.
double-team.effect_short: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.
double-team.name: Double Team

draco-meteor.description:
Comets are summoned down from the sky
onto the target. The attack’s recoil
harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
draco-meteor.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.
draco-meteor.effect_short: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
draco-meteor.name: Draco Meteor

dragon-breath.description:
The user exhales a mighty gust that
inflicts damage. This may also leave the
target with paralysis.
dragon-breath.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
dragon-breath.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
dragon-breath.name: Dragon Breath

dragon-claw.description:
The user slashes the target with huge,
sharp claws.
dragon-claw.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
dragon-claw.name: Dragon Claw

dragon-dance.description:
The user vigorously performs a mystic,
powerful dance that raises its Attack and
Speed stats.
dragon-dance.effect_long: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by one stage each.
dragon-dance.effect_short: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by one stage.
dragon-dance.name: Dragon Dance

dragon-pulse.description:
The target is attacked with a shock wave
generated by the user’s gaping mouth.
dragon-pulse.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
dragon-pulse.name: Dragon Pulse

dragon-rage.description:
This attack hits the target with a shock
wave of pure rage. This attack always
inflicts 40 HP damage.
dragon-rage.name: Dragon Rage

dragon-rush.description:
The user tackles the target while
exhibiting overwhelming menace.
This may also make the target flinch.
dragon-rush.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
dragon-rush.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
dragon-rush.name: Dragon Rush

dragon-tail.description:
The target is knocked away, and a different
Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild,
this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
dragon-tail.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage, then switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon, selected at random.

If the target is under the effect of ingrain or suction-cups, or it has a substitute, or its Trainer has no more usable Pokémon, it will not be switched out.  If the target is a wild Pokémon, the battle ends instead.
dragon-tail.effect_short: Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
dragon-tail.name: Dragon Tail

drain-punch.description:
An energy-draining punch. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage taken
by the target.
drain-punch.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
drain-punch.effect_short: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
drain-punch.name: Drain Punch

draining-kiss.description:
The user steals the target’s energy with a kiss.
The user’s HP is restored by over half
of the damage taken by the target.
draining-kiss.effect_long: Deals regular damage.  Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
draining-kiss.effect_short: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
draining-kiss.name: Draining Kiss

dream-eater.description:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal its own HP.
dream-eater.effect_long: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon.  Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
dream-eater.effect_short: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
dream-eater.name: Dream Eater

drill-peck.description:
A corkscrewing attack with a
sharp beak acting as a drill.
drill-peck.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
drill-peck.name: Drill Peck

drill-run.description:
The user crashes into its target while
rotating its body like a drill.
Critical hits land more easily.
drill-run.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
drill-run.effect_short: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
drill-run.name: Drill Run

dual-chop.description:
The user attacks its target by hitting
it with brutal strikes.
The target is hit twice in a row.
dual-chop.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
dual-chop.name: Dual Chop

dynamic-punch.description:
The user punches the target with full,
concentrated power.
This confuses the target if it hits.
dynamic-punch.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.
dynamic-punch.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.
dynamic-punch.name: Dynamic Punch

earth-power.description:
The user makes the ground under
the target erupt with power.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
earth-power.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
earth-power.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
earth-power.name: Earth Power

earthquake.description:
The user sets off an earthquake that
strikes every Pokémon around it.
earthquake.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is in the first turn of dig, this move will hit with double power.
earthquake.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.
earthquake.name: Earthquake

echoed-voice.description:
The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater damage.
echoed-voice.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use's power is added to this move's power, to a maximum of 200.
echoed-voice.effect_short: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.
echoed-voice.name: Echoed Voice

eerie-impulse.description:
The user’s body generates an eerie impulse.
Exposing the target to it harshly lowers
the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
eerie-impulse.effect_long: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
eerie-impulse.effect_short: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
eerie-impulse.name: Eerie Impulse

egg-bomb.description:
A large egg is hurled at the target
with maximum force to inflict damage.
egg-bomb.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
egg-bomb.name: Egg Bomb

electric-terrain.description:
The user electrifies the ground under
everyone’s feet for five turns.
Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.
electric-terrain.effect_long:
For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes nature-power to thunderbolt.
electric-terrain.effect_short: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.
electric-terrain.name: Electric Terrain

electrify.description:
If the target is electrified before it uses
a move during that turn, the target’s
move becomes Electric type.
electrify.effect_long: Changes the target's move's type to electric if it hasn't moved yet this turn.
electrify.effect_short: Changes the target's move's type to electric if it hasn't moved yet this turn.
electrify.name: Electrify

electro-ball.description:
The user hurls an electric orb
at the target. The faster the user is
than the target, the greater the move’s power.
electro-ball.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's Speed compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 150.

User's Speed                     | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's Speed      |    60
Up to 3× the target's Speed      |    80
Up to 4× the target's Speed      |   120
More than 4× the target's Speed  |   150
electro-ball.effect_short: Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150.
electro-ball.name: Electro Ball

electroweb.description:
The user attacks and captures opposing
Pokémon using an electric net.
This lowers their Speed stat.
electroweb.effect_long: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
electroweb.effect_short: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
electroweb.name: Electroweb

embargo.description:
This move prevents the target from
using its held item. Its Trainer is
also prevented from using items on it.
embargo.effect_long:
Target cannot use its held item for five turns.  If the target leaves the field, this effect ends.

If a Pokémon under this effect uses bug-bite or pluck on a Pokémon holding a berry, the berry is destroyed but not used.  If a Pokémon under this effect uses fling, it will fail.

This effect is passed by baton-pass.
embargo.name: Embargo

ember.description:
The target is attacked with small flames.
This may also leave the target with a burn.
ember.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
ember.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
ember.name: Ember

encore.description:
The user compels the target
to keep using only the move
it last used for three turns.
encore.effect_long:
The next 4–8 times (selected at random) the target attempts to move, it is forced to repeat its last used move.  If the selected move allows the trainer to select a target, an opponent will be selected at random each turn.  If the target is prevented from using the selected move by some other effect, struggle will be used instead.  This effect ends if the selected move runs out of PP.

If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, if it does not know the selected move, or if the selected move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.  If the target's last used move was encore, mimic, mirror-move, sketch, struggle, or transform, this move will fail.
encore.effect_short: Forces the target to repeat its last used move every turn for 2 to 6 turns.
encore.name: Encore

endeavor.description:
An attack move that cuts down the
target’s HP to equal the user’s HP.
endeavor.effect_long: Inflicts exactly enough damage to lower the target's HP to equal the user's.  If the target's HP is not higher than the user's, this move has no effect.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.  This effect counts as damage for moves that respond to damage.
endeavor.effect_short: Lowers the target's HP to equal the user's.
endeavor.name: Endeavor

endure.description:
The user endures any attack with at least
1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is
used in succession.
endure.effect_long:
The user's HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick-guard, or wide-guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
endure.effect_short: Prevents the user's HP from lowering below 1 this turn.
endure.name: Endure

energy-ball.description:
The user draws power from nature and
fires it at the target.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
energy-ball.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
energy-ball.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
energy-ball.name: Energy Ball

entrainment.description:
The user dances with an odd rhythm that
compels the target to mimic it, making the
target’s Ability the same as the user’s.
entrainment.effect_long: Changes the target's ability to match the user's.  This effect ends when the target leaves battle.
entrainment.effect_short: Copies the user's ability onto the target.
entrainment.name: Entrainment

eruption.description:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with
explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP,
the lower the move’s power.
eruption.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the user's remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
eruption.effect_short: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
eruption.name: Eruption

explosion.description:
The user attacks everything around it
by causing a tremendous explosion.
The user faints upon using this move.
explosion.effect_long: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses.  Inflicts regular damage.
explosion.name: Explosion

extrasensory.description:
The user attacks with an odd,
unseeable power.
This may also make the target flinch.
extrasensory.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
extrasensory.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
extrasensory.name: Extrasensory

extreme-speed.description:
The user charges the target at blinding
speed. This move always goes first.
extreme-speed.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
extreme-speed.name: Extreme Speed

facade.description:
An attack move that doubles its power if
the user is poisoned, burned, or
has paralysis.
facade.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, this move has double power.
facade.effect_short: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.
facade.name: Facade

fairy-lock.description:
By locking down the battlefield,
the user keeps all Pokémon from
fleeing during the next turn.
fairy-lock.effect_long: Prevents all Pokémon from fleeing or switching out during the next turn.
fairy-lock.effect_short: Prevents all Pokémon from fleeing or switching out during the next turn.
fairy-lock.name: Fairy Lock

fairy-wind.description:
The user stirs up a fairy wind
and strikes the target with it.
fairy-wind.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
fairy-wind.name: Fairy Wind

fake-out.description:
An attack that hits first and makes the
target flinch. It only works the first turn
the user is in battle.
fake-out.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Causes the target to flinch.  Can only be used on the user's first turn after entering the field.
fake-out.effect_short: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle.  Causes the target to flinch.
fake-out.name: Fake Out

fake-tears.description:
The user feigns crying to fluster
the target, harshly lowering its
Sp. Def stat.
fake-tears.effect_long: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
fake-tears.effect_short: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
fake-tears.name: Fake Tears

false-swipe.description:
A restrained attack that prevents the
target from fainting.
The target is left with at least 1 HP.
false-swipe.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Will not reduce the target's HP below 1.
false-swipe.effect_short: Cannot lower the target's HP below 1.
false-swipe.name: False Swipe

feather-dance.description:
The user covers the target’s body with a
mass of down that harshly lowers its
Attack stat.
feather-dance.effect_long: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
feather-dance.effect_short: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
feather-dance.name: Feather Dance

feint.description:
An attack that hits a target using
Protect or Detect. This also lifts
the effects of those moves.
feint.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting.

This move cannot be copied by mirror-move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
feint.name: Feint

feint-attack.description:
The user approaches the target
disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch.
This attack never misses.
feint-attack.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
feint-attack.name: Feint Attack

fell-stinger.description:
When the user knocks out a target
with this move, the user’s Attack stat
rises sharply.
fell-stinger.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
fell-stinger.effect_short: Raises the user's Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
fell-stinger.name: Fell Stinger

fiery-dance.description:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances
and flaps its wings. This may also
raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
fiery-dance.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
fiery-dance.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
fiery-dance.name: Fiery Dance

final-gambit.description:
The user risks everything to attack its
target. The user faints but does damage
equal to its HP.
final-gambit.effect_long: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP.  User faints.
final-gambit.effect_short: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP.  User faints.
final-gambit.name: Final Gambit

fire-blast.description:
The target is attacked with an intense
blast of all-consuming fire.
This may also leave the target with a burn.
fire-blast.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
fire-blast.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
fire-blast.name: Fire Blast

fire-fang.description:
The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs.
This may also make the target flinch or leave
it with a burn.
fire-fang.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target and a separate $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
fire-fang.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
fire-fang.name: Fire Fang

fire-pledge.description:
A column of fire hits the target. When used with
its grass equivalent, its damage increases and
a vast sea of fire appears.
fire-pledge.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used water-pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
fire-pledge.effect_short: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon's moves for four turns.
fire-pledge.name: Fire Pledge

fire-punch.description:
The target is punched with a fiery fist.
This may also leave the target with a burn.
fire-punch.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
fire-punch.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
fire-punch.name: Fire Punch

fire-spin.description:
The target becomes trapped within a
fierce vortex of fire that rages for four
to five turns.
fire-spin.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid-spin cancels this effect.
fire-spin.effect_short: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
fire-spin.name: Fire Spin

fissure.description:
The user opens up a fissure in the ground
and drops the target in.
The target faints instantly if this attack hits.
fissure.effect_long:
Inflicts damage equal to the target's max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move's accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock-on, mind-reader, and no-guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.
fissure.name: Fissure

flail.description:
The user flails about aimlessly to attack.
The less HP the user has,
the greater the move’s power.
flail.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power varies inversely with the user's proportional remaining HP.

64 * current HP / max HP | Power
-----------------------: | ----:
 0– 1                    |  200
 2– 5                    |  150
 6–12                    |  100
13–21                    |   80
22–42                    |   40
43–64                    |   20
flail.effect_short: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.
flail.name: Flail

flame-burst.description:
The user attacks the target with a
bursting flame. The bursting flame damages
Pokémon next to the target as well.
flame-burst.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.
flame-burst.effect_short: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
flame-burst.name: Flame Burst

flame-charge.description:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks.
Then, building up more power,
the user raises its Speed stat.
flame-charge.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.
flame-charge.effect_short: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.
flame-charge.name: Flame Charge

flame-wheel.description:
The user cloaks itself in fire and
charges at the target.
This may also leave the target with a burn.
flame-wheel.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
flame-wheel.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
flame-wheel.name: Flame Wheel

flamethrower.description:
The target is scorched with an intense
blast of fire. This may also leave the target
with a burn.
flamethrower.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
flamethrower.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
flamethrower.name: Flamethrower

flare-blitz.description:
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot.
This may leave the target with a burn.
flare-blitz.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
flare-blitz.effect_short: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
flare-blitz.name: Flare Blitz

flash.description:
The user flashes a bright light that cuts
the target’s accuracy.
flash.effect_long: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
flash.effect_short: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
flash.name: Flash

flash-cannon.description:
The user gathers all its light energy and
releases it at once. This may also lower the
target’s Sp. Def stat.
flash-cannon.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
flash-cannon.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
flash-cannon.name: Flash Cannon

flatter.description:
Flattery is used to confuse the target.
However, this also raises the target’s
Sp. Atk stat.
flatter.effect_long: Raises the target's Special Attack by one stage, then confuses it.
flatter.effect_short: Raises the target's Special Attack by one stage and confuses the target.
flatter.name: Flatter

fling.description:
The user flings its held item at the target
to attack. This move’s power and effects
depend on the item.
fling.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's held item.  The item is consumed.  If the user is not holding an item, or its item has no set type and power, this move will fail.

This move ignores sticky-hold.

If the user is under the effect of embargo, this move will fail.
fling.effect_short: Throws held item at the target; power depends on the item.
fling.name: Fling

flower-shield.description:
The user raises the Defense stat
of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle
with a mysterious power.
flower-shield.effect_long: Raises the Defense of all grass Pokémon in battle.
flower-shield.effect_short: Raises the Defense of all grass Pokémon in battle
flower-shield.name: Flower Shield

fly.description:
The user soars and then strikes
its target on the next turn. This can
also be used to fly to any familiar town.
fly.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  User flies high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, gust, hurricane, sky-uppercut, smack-down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind still hit the user normally.  gust and twister also have double power against the user.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock-on, mind-reader, or no-guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep-talk.
fly.effect_short: User flies high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.
fly.name: Fly

flying-press.description:
The user dives down onto the target
from the sky. This move is Fighting
and Flying type simultaneously.
flying-press.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the purposes of type effectiveness, this move is both fighting- and flying-type: its final effectiveness is determined by multiplying the effectiveness of each type against each of the target's types.

For all other purposes, this move is pure Fighting-type.  If this move's type is changed, its Fighting typing is overwritten, and its secondary type remains Flying.

If the target has used minimize since entering battle, this move has double power and will never miss.
flying-press.effect_short: Deals both fighting and flying-type damage.
flying-press.name: Flying Press

focus-blast.description:
The user heightens its mental focus and
unleashes its power.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
focus-blast.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
focus-blast.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
focus-blast.name: Focus Blast

focus-energy.description:
The user takes a deep breath and
focuses so that critical hits land
more easily.
focus-energy.effect_long:
User's critical hit rate is two levels higher until it leaves the field.  If the user has already used focus-energy since entering the field, this move will fail.

This effect is passed on by baton-pass.
focus-energy.effect_short: Increases the user's chance to score a critical hit.
focus-energy.name: Focus Energy

focus-punch.description:
The user focuses its mind before
launching a punch. This move fails
if the user is hit before it is used.
focus-punch.effect_long:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the user takes damage this turn before hitting, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror-move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep-talk.
focus-punch.effect_short: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.
focus-punch.name: Focus Punch

follow-me.description:
The user draws attention to itself,
making all targets take aim
only at the user.
follow-me.effect_long:
Until the end of this turn, any moves that opposing Pokémon target solely at the user's ally will instead target the user.  If both Pokémon on the same side of the field use this move on the same turn, the Pokémon that uses it last will become the target.

This effect takes priority over lightning-rod and storm-drain.

If the user's ally switches out, opposing Pokémon may still hit it with pursuit.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
follow-me.effect_short: Redirects the target's single-target effects to the user for this turn.
follow-me.name: Follow Me

force-palm.description:
The target is attacked with a shock wave.
This may also leave the target
with paralysis.
force-palm.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
force-palm.effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
force-palm.name: Force Palm

foresight.description:
Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by
Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also
enables an evasive target to be hit.
foresight.effect_long: Resets the target's evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
foresight.effect_short: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it's a Ghost.
foresight.name: Foresight

forests-curse.description:
The user puts a forest curse on the target.
Afflicted targets are now Grass type as well.
forests-curse.effect_long: Adds grass to the target's types.
forests-curse.effect_short: Adds grass to the target's types.
forests-curse.name: Forest's Curse

foul-play.description:
The user turns the target’s power
against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat,
the greater the move’s power.
foul-play.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage is calculated using the target's attacking stat rather than the user's.
foul-play.effect_short: Calculates damage with the target's attacking stat.
foul-play.name: Foul Play

freeze-dry.description:
The user rapidly cools the target.
This may also leave the target frozen.
This move is super effective on Water types.
freeze-dry.effect_long:
Deals regular damage.  This move is super-effective against the water type.

The target's other type will affect damage as usual.  If this move's type is changed, it remains super-effective against Water regardless of its type.
freeze-dry.name: Freeze-Dry

freeze-shock.description:
On the second turn, the user hits the
target with electrically charged ice.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.
freeze-shock.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
freeze-shock.effect_short: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
freeze-shock.name: Freeze Shock

frenzy-plant.description:
The user slams the target with
an enormous tree.
The user can’t move on the next turn.
frenzy-plant.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
frenzy-plant.effect_short: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
frenzy-plant.name: Frenzy Plant

frost-breath.description:
The user blows its cold breath on the
target. This attack always results in
a critical hit.
frost-breath.effect_long: Inflicts regular damage.  Always scores a critical hit.
frost-breath.name: Frost Breath

frustration.description:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the less the user likes
its Trainer.
